_refresh(Object) - Method in class com.trg.dao.hibernate.HibernateDAOHQLImpl
Refresh the content of the given entity from the current database state.
_search(Search) - Method in class com.trg.dao.hibernate.HibernateDAOHQLImpl
Search for objects based on the search parameters in the specified Search object.
_searchAndLength(Search) - Method in class com.trg.dao.hibernate.HibernateDAOHQLImpl
Returns a SearchResult object that includes the list of results like search() and the total length like searchLength.
_searchLength(Search) - Method in class com.trg.dao.hibernate.HibernateDAOHQLImpl
Returns the total number of results that would be returned using the given Search if there were no paging or maxResult limits.
_searchUnique(Search) - Method in class com.trg.dao.hibernate.HibernateDAOHQLImpl
Search for a single result using the given parameters.
_update(Object) - Method in class com.trg.dao.hibernate.HibernateDAOHQLImpl
Update the corresponding object in the database with the properties of the specified object.
